name: Fighting Boredom
description:
This is my very first game I have ever made I do hope people enjoy it. Its not too long but, its something. I love criticism so people leave discussions in the comments and tell me what I should improve on. Enjoy!

Controls: MOVEMENT- W, A, S, D, Spacebar       SHOOTING- F         

Credits: creator- Dylan Carrick , Kai Nissimov on Music, Piariza G. on main menu art and Samuel M. on art design
